title: Short-Intensive Marine English Communication Competency Enhancement Course

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Course emphasizing acquisition of English communication skills needed in marine work environments, incorporating simulations and collaborative activities using digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can clearly communicate in English about more than 10 daily/emergency situations occurring in marine work environments
Learners can convey safety-related messages (emergency, warnings, distress calls, etc.) using standard maritime terminology.
Learners can collaborate in English within scenarios simulating real shipboard environments through team-based projects.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
